technologies.name: K-Sup
technologies.description: K-Sup is an open-source CMS/portal solution dedicated to higher education and research created by Kosmos Education.

technologies.name: Cart Functionality
technologies.description: Websites that have a shopping cart or checkout page, either using a known ecommerce platform or a custom solution.

technologies.name: Apple iCloud Mail
technologies.description: Apple iCloud Mail is a webmail service provided by Apple, Inc.

technologies.name: Java
technologies.description: Java is a class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

technologies.name: MediaElement.js
technologies.description: MediaElement.js is a set of custom Flash plugins that mimic the HTML5 MediaElement API for browsers that don't support HTML5 or don't support the media codecs.

technologies.name: Vue.js
technologies.description: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

technologies.name: Apache HTTP Server
technologies.description: Apache is a free and open-source cross-platform web server software.

technologies.name: OWL Carousel
technologies.description: OWL Carousel is an enabled jQuery plugin that lets you create responsive carousel sliders.

technologies.name: Modernizr
technologies.description: Modernizr is a JavaScript library that detects the features available in a user's browser.

technologies.name: jQuery UI
technologies.description: jQuery UI is a collection of GUI widgets, animated visual effects, and themes implemented with jQuery, Cascading Style Sheets, and HTML.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: DataTables
technologies.description: DataTables is a plug-in for the jQuery Javascript library adding advanced features like pagination, instant search, themes, and more to any HTML table.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Choices
technologies.description: Choices.js is a lightweight, configurable select box/text input plugin.

technologies.name: petite-vue
technologies.description: petite-vue is an alternative distribution of Vue optimised for progressive enhancement.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: RSS
technologies.description: RSS is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
